thread.title: The 30th Vermont International Film Festival kicks off this week
thread.title_full: The 30th Vermont International Film Festival kicks off this week - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: The 30th Vermont International Film Festival kicks off this week
text:
VERMONT - It's a 10 day celebration of cinema and community featuring over 75 films from around the world. The Vermont International Film Festival kicks off tomorrow.
Orly Yardin, Executive Director of the Vermont International Film festival, appeared on the morning show to talk about what's in store.
To learn more about the festival visit: http://vtiff.org/festival/
